title: Apigee - dump_kubernetes
abstract:
# Apigee - dump_kubernetes
You are currently viewing version 1.5 of the Apigee hybrid documentation. **This version is end of life.** You should upgrade to a newer version. For more information, see [Supported versions](/apigee/docs/hybrid/supported-platforms#supported-versions) .
`dump_kubernetes.sh` is a tool provided with Istio to collect data from Kubernetes clusters to create a cluster state archive you can provide with bug reports.
For command line syntax and options, run `dump_kubernetes.sh --help`
For detailed help, see [Kubernetes cluster state archives](https://istio.io/v1.4/about/bugs/#kubernetes-cluster-state-archives) in the istio documentation.
`dump_kubernetes.sh` is installed by default in the `$APIGEECTL_HOME/tools/` directory
